pr_title: [doc] Rename legacy references to product files

timeline.author: pdulth
timeline.path: doc/plugins/org.polarsys.capella.ui.doc/html/Installation Guide/How to install Capella and Addons.mediawiki
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -150,7 +150,7 @@ The installation procedure is the same for all addons.
 To manually install your addon:
 
 *  Download the addon as a dropin
-*  Extract the contents of the downloaded archive into <CAPELLA_INSTALLATION_DIR>/eclipse/dropins directory
+*  Extract the contents of the downloaded archive into <CAPELLA_INSTALLATION_DIR>/dropins directory

timeline.message:
[doc] Rename legacy references to product files

- Renamed eclipse.ini references to capella.ini
- Renamed eclipse.exe references to capella.exe
- Renamed eclipsec.exe references to capellac.exe
- Renamed DIRECTORY\eclipse\capella to DIRECTORY\capella
- Add default value table for JVM options in the capella.ini file
- Remove references obsolete to 32-bit product

Change-Id: I2a7878b58d91808c591653c03ba37fab7960e050
Signed-off-by: Sandu Postaru <sandu.postaru@thalesgroup.com>

[doc] Rename legacy references to product files
